landing.title: DrawStarter: The Easiest Way to Start Your Creation
landing.subtitle: When you're stuck on what to draw today, or when you want to consistently secure your work time, DrawStarter is here to accompany you on your creative journey.
landing.feature_1_description: When you're out of inspiration, you can get a variety of drawing topics instantly with the touch of a button.
landing.feature_2_description: A timer that helps you focus solely on your work for a set amount of time.
landing.feature_3_description: The time you spend using the timer is automatically logged, allowing you to see your work patterns and cumulative time at a glance.
